channel.title: Cant see eachother
channel.description:
In Augeas Pkz server we cant see eachother. Well we could, but then some time later we couldn't see each other. Only when one of us teleported, the other one could see the purple ball thingy (tele animation) but still not the person. And i cant see any NPC's too :P
When i made a new account and met my friend i saw him. How to fix this?
[size=10pt]MOAR INFO:[/size]
It seems that something changes my height level. I think it started when i teled to Fight caves. Now i deleted that thing that changed, and changed the character file but when i log in the level goes back to 4.

item.title: Cant see eachother
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

The commands I mentioned make you go up or down a floor, respectively.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant see eachother

item.description:
@Fabis wrote:

What does the command mean?

Read full topic

item.title: Cant see eachother
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Umm, in that case you might just have to use the equivalent to ::goupz and ::godownz on your server.

I’ve never been on an Augeas server, so I don’t know what the command is on there.

Sorry I can’t help,
~Retard Monkey

Read full topic

item.description:
@Fabis wrote:

Well read the 1st post. I added that something changes my height levels.

item.title: Cant see eachother
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

I can read.
I simply assumed you were using a webclient, as clearing cookies sometimes helps on them.
I’m sorry that I’m too retarded to understand.

Read full topic

@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Well, I doubt thius will help much, but try clearing your cookies.
Otherwise, your account has just gone retarded somehow, but I don’t know how because I am also retarded.
